title: Amrita Sen: Risk of a Bigger Decline in Oil Prices
description: Amrita Sen, Energy Aspects founder, says Venezuela’s exports have already halved under ongoing U.S. sanctions. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” the oil rally reflects the largest short positioning in Brent in ten years. (Source: Bloomberg)
